name: WeatherCompanion
0:
”Alexa, ask Weather Companion how should I be dressing today”
”What should I wear tomorrow?”
”Give me a dressing advice for today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weather companion
des:
Weather companion tells you how to dress depending on the weather. Simply ask "What to wear today" or "What to wear tomorrow" and you will get a weather-related dressing advice!
To contact the developer of the Weather Companion skill, please email constancegobert@hotmail.fr
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
